feature.label: NetzDatenStrom Proxy Feature
feature.description: This feature bundles all plug-ins that are needed for the use cases of the module named "proxy" of the research project NetzDatenStrom (NDS). (1) read COSEM/XML and topology data (JSON or XML), (2) aggregate measurements beneath each substation, (3) send aggregation results as IEC 60870-5-104 messages, and (4) send raw data as CIM/XML.
